Articles.Content:
Hi everybody

I have been playing the demo of this game for nearly 3 weeks and I am absolutely hooked. I Just recently downloaded the paid version and decided to take the plunge and join the forums. I\'m really excited to get involved here and watch KSP grow.

I did do a little browsing and stumbled upon the massive mod and add on section, so I was wondering if you guys had any recommendations for any essentials.
WELCOME,, Your gonna love the mods section,, I\'d recommend,,Bigtrak,Silisco edition,, Nova Punch and mechjeb just for a start,,, Many hours of fun to be had.
mechjeb is great! its the only add on im using right now and its made me into a real Kerbinaut instead of just being a slighty intelligent guided moon bomb.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
I personally enjoy KW Rocketry\'s parts http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=2680.0. Pretty nice selection, and very balanced. Check it out!
